Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2009 10:52PM llshuman wrote: Hi myagirl, I started TCx6 in March, and I started losing my hair on day 14 after the 1st treatment.  Like you, I was hoping to be the one who didn't lose her hair --- but I wasn't.  My scalp hurt for a few days, then on day 14 in the shower hair covered my hands while shampooing.  It took about a week for 99.99% of it to fall out.  My husband trimmed the stragglers, and now I am bald as a baby.  Hair loss is annoying, but manageable.  I bought some hats from tlc.org, scarves from www.4women.com, and a fabulous wig from a local wig shop. For me, the worst part was the anticipation of losing it.  Once it finally fell out, I was somewhat relieved to be getting on with this stage of the treatment plan. Hang in there.
Posts.Title: Does everyone loose their hair during TC chemo myagirl Sharon648
